description: English Translations for 'MSF Mental Health - MHPSS Baseline'

translations.Total number of beneficiaries in family: Total number of beneficiaries in family consultation
translations.Main problem or reason for referral (Why: Main problem or reason for referral (Why is the patient coming to the MH department Write in patient's words)
translations.Clinical diagnosis (To be established on: Clinical diagnosis (To be established only by psychologist)
translations.Important details of the main problem Ho: Important details of the main problem (How long have they had the problem? Significant events, etc.)
translations.Patient presentation How do they look or: Patient presentation (How do they look or speak? Motor activity, mood, thoughts, perceptions. Is the patient oriented in time, space, person, recent events?)
translations.Did you have problems performing daily a: Did you have problems performing daily activities such as cooking, bathing, or chores outside the household?
translations.Did you have problems getting along with: Did you have problems getting along with family or friends?
translations.Did you have any problems sleeping such: Did you have any problems sleeping, such as sleeping too much or not enough?
translations.Have you been bothered by unpleasant tho: Have you been bothered by unpleasant thoughts, worries, or ideas?
translations.Have you felt sad or nervous: Have you felt sad or nervous?
translations.Little interest or pleasure in doing thi: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
translations.Trouble falling or staying asleep or sle: Trouble falling or staying asleep or sleeping too much
translations.Feeling tired or having little energy: Feeling tired or having little energy
translations.Feeling bad about yourself - or that you: Feeling bad about yourself, or that you are a failure, or have let yourself or your family down
translations.Trouble concentrating on things such as: Trouble concentrating on things such as reading the newspaper or watching television
translations.Moving or speaking so slowly that other: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed, or the opposite—being so fidgety or restless that you've been moving around a lot more than usual
translations.Thoughts that you would be better off de: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
translations.CGI-S score - How mentally ill is the pa: CGI-S score - How mentally ill is the patient at this time
translations.Positive functionality Is the patient ca: Positive functionality (Is the patient capable of being independent, caring for themselves—bathing/eating—going to work/school, etc.?)
translations.Internal resources Does the patient beli: Internal resources (Does the patient believe that they have the abilities needed to overcome the current problem / do they have hope for their future?)
translations.External resources Does the patient beli: External resources (Does the patient believe that they have someone they can rely on for help in their lives?)
translations.Spiritual / moral resources Are the pati: Spiritual / moral resources (Are the patient’s beliefs a source of strength for them when dealing with problems?)
translations.Has the patient had thoughts of death or: Has the patient had thoughts of death or suicide?
translations.Has the patient hurt themselves / caused: Has the patient hurt themselves or caused self-harm?
translations.Has the patient attempted suicide or tri: Has the patient attempted suicide or tried to kill themselves?
translations.Is the patient currently at risk of hurt: Is the patient currently at risk of hurting themselves or attempting suicide?
Is the patient currently at risk of hurting others?
translations.Does the patient regularly use alcohol /: Does the patient regularly use alcohol or substances to become intoxicated?
translations.Is the patient currently on psychotropic: Is the patient currently on psychotropic or psychiatric medication?
translations.Has the patient experienced an act of ag: Has the patient experienced an act of aggression or violence?
translations.Time between violence event and consulta: Time between the violence event and consultation
translations.If yes would the patient like a referral: If yes, would the patient like a referral to the medical department for treatment (or midwife/maternity for sexual violence)?
translations.Relevant details of the past / precipita: Relevant details of the past / precipitating events
translations.Overall Goals for therapy (what are you: Overall Goals for therapy (What are you trying to accomplish over several sessions with the patient? Try to be specific and define these with the patient)
translations.Todays Session (what did you do today in: Today's Session (What did you do today in session?)
translations.Homework (what will the patient do befor: Homework (What will the patient do before the next session?)
translations.Follow up session required (If no fill t: Follow-up session required (If no, fill out the Exit form)
